channel.title: Xbox live
channel.description:
well guys sadly my Xbox live has ran out. i was wondering if anyone had a 24 or 48 hour code?
anyhow to make sure this doesn't get flamed im going to put a question up.
what online service do you pay for and how much do you pay for it?

item.title: Xbox live
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I can’t wait for Battlefield 3, also. Bad Company 2 is an amazing game. I can’t wait to see what all will be waiting for me in the successor. I’ve seen screenshots with their new lighting engine and it looks absolutely fantastic.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox live
item.dc:creator: @Vexx Vexx
item.description:
@Vexx wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:9, topic:406188”]I usually have a recurring monthly subscription coming straight off my card.

p.s. If you’re desperate to play, just make a new account, I think all new accounts have a one month free gold trial.[/quote]
i did until i noticed gears of war was having another xp event so i raged so hard because i ran outta xbox live almost lvl 100 on my account…

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox live
item.dc:creator: @Jerico_Pimpinbro Jerico Pimpinbro
item.description:
@Jerico_Pimpinbro wrote:

reyx7:

Hey man, battlefield 3 all the way. Well, I hope so anyway.

The trailer for that game looked pretty sick. Def. will keep it in mind when I go to buy MW3+Saints row: The third ;p

Read full topic

item.description:

I usually have a recurring monthly subscription coming straight off my card.

p.s. If you’re desperate to play, just make a new account, I think all new accounts have a one month free gold trial.

item.title: Xbox live
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

COD series is my lover. <3
BattleField is quite amazing, as it doesn’t have screaming 4 year old children saying “Fuck this” and “Fuck you” cause their mothers are out doing crack(; imo.

item.title: Xbox live
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

reyx7:

I tried Xbox live at a friends house with some COD BLK, and some cocky 12 yr olds joined saying they where gonna rape us. They ended up on our team and, needless to say, I trapped them in corners.

PROTIP: Dont buy a game every kid in America wants. You eill find a much more mature player base.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I normally just get the whole year. I don’t really play my Xbox much anymore, although when Skyrim comes out, I’m sure that’s all I will be doing for about a month straight. Goodfight life.
